import React , {useState} from 'react' import {Form} from 'react-bootstrap' export default function Login() { const [user, setUser] = useState({name: '',email: '',password:''}) const [err, setErr] = useState('') const onChangeInput = e=>{ const {name,value}=e.target; setUser({...user, [name]:value}) setErr('') } return (
